title: Lizzo's Silver Cat-Eye Nails Are Giving "Mermaidcore"
description: Lizzo just took the cat-eye nail trend on vacation. While partying at Hi Ibiza, a disco club in Spain, with Grammy-winning music producer Kaytranada, the singer showed off a fresh set on Instagram of silver cat-eye nails paired with head-turning, Game of Thrones-inspired icy blond curls. Lizzo's nails feature a chrome-silver base with a soft diagonal stripe of light - the telltale sign of a cat-eye manicure. The effect comes from a magnetic polish laced with iron particles, which shift when a magnet is held over the nail, creating a glowing, dimensional finish. The result is like a cross between velvet, shimmer, and molten metal - similar to the reflective surface of an actual cat's eye. Originally popular in the early 2010s, cat-eye nails have returned with a modern twist, thanks to a new wave of celebrity fans like Jenna Dewan, Sydney Sweeney, and Ashley Tisdale. While the look works in nearly every color, Lizzo's silver take feels equal parts mermaidcore and sci-fi. Image Source: Instagram user lizzobeeating Want to try it at home? All you need is a magnetic cat-eye polish or a silver glitter, like the Manicurist Nail Polish in Disco ($14) or the Cirque Colors Magnetic Nail Polish in Starry Eyed ($17). Whether you're headed to Ibiza or just want something eye-catching for the weekend, silver cat-eye nails might be your next move. Olivia Tauber is a freelance writer based in New York, passionate about crafting authentic stories through personal essays and profiles. Her career began in corporate publicity at Showtime and Paramount, followed by production for "The Pivot," an Emmy-nominated series.
author: Olivia Tauber

html:
While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

Lizzo just took the cat-eye nail trend on vacation. While partying at Hi Ibiza, a disco club in Spain, with Grammy-winning music producer Kaytranada, the singer showed off a fresh set on Instagram of silver cat-eye nails paired with head-turning, Game of Thrones-inspired icy blond curls.

Lizzo's nails feature a chrome-silver base with a soft diagonal stripe of light — the telltale sign of a cat-eye manicure. The effect comes from a magnetic polish laced with iron particles, which shift when a magnet is held over the nail, creating a glowing, dimensional finish. The result is like a cross between velvet, shimmer, and molten metal — similar to the reflective surface of an actual cat's eye.

Originally popular in the early 2010s, cat-eye nails have returned with a modern twist, thanks to a new wave of celebrity fans like Jenna Dewan, Sydney Sweeney, and Ashley Tisdale. While the look works in nearly every color, Lizzo's silver take feels equal parts mermaidcore and sci-fi.

Want to try it at home? All you need is a magnetic cat-eye polish or a silver glitter, like the Manicurist Nail Polish in Disco ($14) or the Cirque Colors Magnetic Nail Polish in Starry Eyed ($17). Whether you're headed to Ibiza or just want something eye-catching for the weekend, silver cat-eye nails might be your next move.

Olivia Tauber is a freelance writer based in New York, passionate about crafting authentic stories through personal essays and profiles. Her career began in corporate publicity at Showtime and Paramount, followed by production for "The Pivot," an Emmy-nominated series.
